      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h2>Test Race</h2>

<table><tr><td bgcolor='$!data.voicecolor'><i>Finally, on the bottom of the pre-race investment screen, 
you are asked to 
give us your expectation of the chance of your car winning, and to indicate how confident you are in 
this prediction. Click on the sliding scale to see how the values change (again, the values you select 
in this test race have no impact on anything).  When you click 'Continue', you will see the whole investment
screen again. After that, we will talk you through the beginning of a 
race.
</i></td></tr></table>

<p>Please also tell us your guess of the likelihood of your car winning:</p>

<table width="100%"><tr>
<td width="10%"></td>
<td width='800px' valign='top'>
<slider name='expectation'  min='0' max='1000' scale='1'  label="Out of 1000 races, how often do you think your car would arrive first? ( __ out of 1000 times )"
#if ( $data.newpage != "true" )
    value="$!data.expectation" 
#end 
>
#if ($error.expectation) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to make a prediction.</font>
#end

<br>

<slider name='confidence'  min='0' max='100' scale='1'  label="How confident are you that your guess is roughly right? ( __ out of 100 % )"
#if ( $data.newpage != "true" )
    value="$!data.confidence" 
#end 
>
#if ($error.confidence ) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to make a statement here.</font>
#end
</td><td width='10%'></td></tr>
</table>
